channel.title: Map editing
channel.description:
how would i go about changing the map? as in the terrain... the entities i understand how to change, but the terrain also needs to be changed for my server to seem decent
any ideas on it?
my guess would be that it has something to do with worldmap.dat, but i do not know how this file is formatted all help appreciated
solved: much obliged solution was : http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,351106.0.html
